manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description:
This plugin adds some basic support for creating the web application based on Stripes framework.

It comes with easy configuration dialog, when creating a new web application project, the developer could easily include all requied jar files and also modify the web.xml file.
manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Module-Dependencies: org.jdesktop.beansbinding/1 > 1.1.1, org.netbeans.api.java.classpath/1 > 1.18.2, org.netbeans.api.web.webmodule > 1.12.1, org.netbeans.modules.editor/3 > 1.63.1.5.20.32, org.netbeans.modules.editor.lib/3 > 3.24.1.20.32, org.netbeans.modules.editor.mimelookup/1 > 1.26.1, org.netbeans.modules.html.lexer/1 > 1.3.1, org.netbeans.modules.j2ee.dd/1 > 1.12.1.2, org.netbeans.modules.java.lexer/1 > 1.4.1, org.netbeans.modules.java.project/1 > 1.22.2, org.netbeans.modules.java.source > 0.40.3.7.7, org.netbeans.modules.lexer/2 > 1.29.1.1, org.netbeans.modules.project.libraries/1 > 1.19.2, org.netbeans.modules.projectapi/1 > 1.19.1, org.netbeans.modules.projectuiapi/1 > 1.31.1.6, org.openide.awt > 7.3.1.1, org.openide.dialogs > 7.8.1, org.openide.explorer > 6.16.2, org.openide.filesystems > 7.13.1.1.1, org.openide.loaders > 7.2.3, org.openide.nodes > 7.7.3.1, org.openide.text > 6.21.2, org.openide.util > 7.18.1.1, org.openide.util.lookup > 8.15.2, org.openide.windows > 6.24.1

manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: This autoupdate center works for keeping the Stripes 4 Netneans plugin up-to-date.
